name: OpenAI
description: GPT models for reasoning, writing, structuring, and exploring ideas quickly.
why: When you want to clarify an idea or test a line of reasoning without going in circles.

name: Claude (Anthropic)
description: Models focused on long-form reasoning, analysis, and structured writing.
why: To dig deep into a topic or make a complex decision without bias.

name: Google Gemini
description: Multimodal models integrated into the Google ecosystem.
why: Useful for cross-referencing perspectives and challenging an idea from a different angle.

name: DeepSeek
description: High-performing and accessible models focused on reasoning and code.
why: Worth exploring when you want to test an effective low-cost alternative.

name: v0
description: React/Tailwind UI generation from prompts.
why: Go from an idea to a concrete interface in just a few minutes.

name: Lovable
description: AI-assisted full-stack app generator.
why: Prototype a complete product without over-architecting too early.

name: Bolt.new
description: Rapid front/back prototyping environment in the browser.
why: Test a technical idea without installing or configuring anything.

name: Figma Make
description: Fast design creation and iteration via AI in Figma.
why: Explore visual directions without getting stuck on a blank page.

name: n8n
description: Open-source automation for orchestrating APIs, data, and AI.
why: Save time without losing control or depending on a black box.

name: Gumloop
description: AI-assisted automation focused on productivity.
why: Quickly test automations when speed is the priority.

name: Promptmetheus
description: IDE for testing, comparing, and structuring prompts.
why: Stop guessing and understand what actually works.

name: PromptLayer
description: Prompt and AI call tracking and versioning.
why: Keep a clear record of what works and what breaks.

name: Midjourney
description: High-end artistic image generation.
why: Give a strong identity to an idea right from the start.

name: Flux (Black Forest Labs)
description: High-performing and flexible image generation models.
why: Create clean, production-ready visuals.

name: Leonardo AI
description: Production-oriented visual asset generation.
why: Quickly produce consistent visuals without a dedicated designer.

name: HeyGen
description: Video creation with AI avatars.
why: Explain a product or idea without hiding behind slides.

name: ElevenLabs
description: Realistic voice synthesis and voice cloning.
why: Add a credible voice without any equipment or studio.

name: Typefully
description: Content planning and writing for X / LinkedIn.
why: Share regularly without spending too much mental energy on it.

name: Buffer
description: Simple multi-platform content scheduling.
why: Schedule ahead to stay consistent without friction.

name: Supabase Vector
description: Vector storage built into Postgres.
why: Set up RAG without adding an unnecessary component.

name: Ollama
description: Run LLM models locally.
why: Keep control and experiment without depending on the cloud.

name: Claude Code
description: AI assistant integrated into code and refactoring workflows.
why: Move faster without sacrificing readability or logic.
